00044 function PrintFilterCatForms($list)
00045 {
00046     global $View;
00047 
00048     $listconf= array(
00049         'exception' => array(
00050             'title' => _TITLE2('Whitelist'),
00051             'color' => 'white',
00052             ),
00053         'gray'  => array(
00054             'title' => _TITLE2('Greylist'),
00055             'color' => '#eee',
00056             ),
00057         'banned'    => array(
00058             'title' => _TITLE2('Blacklist'),
00059             'color' => 'gray',
00060             ),
00061         'weighted'  => array(
00062             'title' => _TITLE2('Weighted phrase list'),
00063             'color' => '#f4f3c2',
00064             ),
00065         );
00066 
00067     $group= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'];
00068 
00069     $catlists= array(
00070         'sites'     => array('exception', 'gray', 'banned'),
00071         'urls'      => array('exception', 'gray', 'banned'),
00072         'phrases'   => array('exception', 'banned', 'weighted'),
00073         );
00074     
00075     foreach ($catlists[$list] as $type) {
00076         if ($View->Controller($cats, 'GetEnabledCats', $group, $list, $type)) {
00077             echo $listconf[$type]['title'].':';
00078             ?>
00079             <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00080                 <table style="width: auto; background: <?php echo $listconf[$type]['color'] ?>;">
00081                     <tr>
00082                         <td>
00083                             <?php echo _TITLE2('Enabled') ?>
00084                             <br />
00085                             <select name="Cats[]" multiple style="width: 200px; height: 100px;">
00086                                 <?php
00087                                 for ($i = 0; $i < count($cats); $i++) {
00088                                     if (preg_match('/([^\/]*)\/([^_]*)_(.*)/', $cats[$i], $match)) {
00089                                         $title= $match[1].' ('.$match[3].')';
00090                                     }
00091                                     else {
00092                                         $title= dirname($cats[$i]);
00093                                     }
00094                                     ?>
00095                                     <option value="<?php echo $cats[$i] ?>"><?php echo $title ?></option>
00096                                     <?php
00097                                 }
00098                                 ?>
00099                             </select>
00100                             <input type="submit" name="Disable" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Disable') ?>"/>
00101                         </td>
00102                         <td>
00103                             <?php
00104                             if ($View->Controller($cats, 'GetDisabledCats', $group, $list, $type)) {
00105                                 echo _TITLE2('Disabled');
00106                                 ?>
00107                                 <br />
00108                                 <select name="Cats[]" multiple style="width: 200px; height: 100px;">
00109                                     <?php
00110                                     for ($i = 0; $i < count($cats); $i++) {
00111                                         if (preg_match('/([^\/]*)\/([^_]*)_(.*)/', $cats[$i], $match)) {
00112                                             $title= $match[1].' ('.$match[3].')';
00113                                         }
00114                                         else {
00115                                             $title= dirname($cats[$i]);
00116                                         }
00117                                         ?>
00118                                         <option value="<?php echo $cats[$i] ?>"><?php echo $title ?></option>
00119                                         <?php
00120                                     }
00121                                     ?>
00122                                 </select>
00123                                 <input type="submit" name="Enable" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Enable') ?>"/>
00124                                 <?php
00125                             }
00126                             ?>
00127                         </td>
00128                     </tr>
00129                 </table>
00130                 <input type="hidden" name="ListType" value=<?php echo $type ?> />
00131             </form>
00132             <?php
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }
00136 
00137 if ($_POST['Cats']) {
00138     foreach ($_POST['Cats'] as $CatSubcat) {
00139         $CatArray= explode('/', $CatSubcat, 2);
00140         $Cat= $CatArray[0];
00141         $Subcat= $CatArray[1];
00142         if ($_POST['Disable']) {
00143             $View->Controller($Output, 'TurnOffCats', $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'], $Submenu, $_POST['ListType'], $Cat, $Subcat);
00144         }
00145         else if ($_POST['Enable']) {
00146             $View->Controller($Output, 'TurnOnCats', $_SESSION[$View->Model]['Group'], $Submenu, $_POST['ListType'], $Cat, $Subcat);
00147         }
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00151 $View->SetSessionFilterGroup();
00152 
00153 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00154         
00155 $View->PrintFilterGroupForm();
00156 PrintFilterCatForms($Submenu);
00157 
00158 PrintHelpWindow($View->ConfHelpMsg."\n\n".$ListHelpMsg.' '.$WeightedListHelpMsg);
00159 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
00160 ?>
